summary: 67 DAYS & 1230 MILES AFTER PURCHASING, JUST AFTER STARTING AND MERGING INTO HEAVY, FAST MOVING CITY TRAFFIC, THE CHECK ENGINE LIGHT & SEVERAL OTHERS COME ON.   THEN ON STAR TEXT AND EMAIL DIAGNOSTIC ALERT RECEIVED: "SERVICE THE ENGINE AND TRANSMISSION IN YOUR VEHICLE IMMEDIATELY". THE ENGINE WAS ACTING SLUGGISH, ROUGH,  JOLTING, NO ACCELERATION, MAX SPEED BARELY 30PMH, A/C STOPS WORKING. ON STAR DIAGNOSTIC REPORT (MONTHLY EMAIL REPORT) AT 1200 MILES WAS PERFECT, 40 MINUTES PRIOR. DEALER SERVICE DIAGNOSED CYLINDER #2 MISFIRES, COMPONENT TESTING ON THE THRESHOLD OF BEING SHORTED. REPLACED #2 FUEL INJECTOR. DIAGNOSTIC CODES AVAIL. IF NEEDED. VEHICLE IS BRAND NEW! CONCERNED ABOUT SERIOUS FUTURE ENGINE PROBLEMS WITH NO WARNING AND/OR POSSIBILITY VEHICLE IS A LEMON.
